TopicTitle: Question: Installing Mods for current version

Articles.Content: Is it possible to install mods with the current version without downgrading KSP to older versions? The mods I would want to install are Realism Overhaul and kOS or even possibly kRPC. Looking forward to an answer. I'm also new to this forum so I quite don't know what to expect yet, if you guys are willing to recommend content to read on this forum, I'd be happy to know :))
Welcome to the forum @Megaraph6, your question has been moved to add-on discussions.
Use KSP Recall, a mod that allows you to do that
